sentence.Network_en: Nature has dowered her with both beauty and brains.
sentence.Network_cn: 大自然赋予她美貌与智慧.

sentence.Network_en: The company has dowered the prospective bride.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们公司把嫁妆送给了这位前途无量的新娘.

sentence.Network_en: When she got married, she got dowered.
